title: Figgy Pudding Balls
directions: Crumble fig bars into a bowl. Stir walnuts, orange juice concentrate, cinnamon, allspice, and cloves with the fig bars until well incorporated. Shape mixture into balls and roll in confectioners' sugar to coat.
ingredients: 26  fig bars (such as Nabisco Fig Newtons)
1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
¼ cup confectioners' sugar, or as needed
